verses.verse: The word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> that came<WH1961> to Jeremiah<WH3414> concerning<WH1697> the dearth.<WH1226>
Judah<WH3063> mourns,<WH56> and the gates<WH8179> thereof languish;<WH535> they are black<WH6937> to the ground;<WH776> and the cry<WH6682> of Jerusalem<WH3389> is gone<WH5927> up.

And their nobles<WH117> have sent<WH7971> their little<WH6810> ones to the waters:<WH4325> they came<WH935> to the pits,<WH1356> and found<WH4672> no<WH3808> water;<WH4325> they returned<WH7725> with their vessels<WH3627> empty;<WH7387> they were ashamed<WH954> and confounded,<WH3637> and covered<WH2645> their heads.<WH7218>
Because<WH5668> the ground<WH127> is beat down,<WH2865> for there was no<WH3808> rain<WH1653> in the earth,<WH776> the plowmen<WH406> were ashamed,<WH954> they covered<WH2645> their heads.<WH7218>
Yes,<WH3588> <WH1571> the hind<WH365> also<WH1571> calved<WH3205> in the field,<WH7704> and forsook<WH5800> it, because<WH3588> there was no<WH3808> grass.<WH1758>

And the wild<WH6501> asses<WH6501> did stand<WH5975> in the high<WH8205> places, they snuffed<WH7602> up the wind<WH7307> like dragons;<WH8577> their eyes<WH5869> did fail,<WH3615> because<WH3588> there was no<WH369> grass.<WH6212>

O LORD,<WH3068> though<WH518> our iniquities<WH5771> testify<WH6030> against us, do<WH6213> you it for your name's<WH8034> sake:<WH4616> for our backslidings<WH4878> are many;<WH7231> we have sinned<WH2398> against you.

O the hope<WH4723> of Israel,<WH3478> the savior<WH3467> thereof in time<WH6256> of trouble,<WH6869> why<WH4100> should you be as a stranger<WH1616> in the land,<WH776> and as a wayfaring<WH732> man that turns<WH5186> aside<WH5186> to tarry<WH3885> for a night?

Why<WH4100> should you be as a man<WH376> astonished,<WH1724> as a mighty<WH1368> man<WH376> that cannot<WH3808> <WH3201> save?<WH3467> yet you, O LORD,<WH3068> are in the middle<WH7130> of us, and we are called<WH7121> by your name;<WH8034> leave<WH5117> us not.

Thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> to this<WH2088> people,<WH5971> Thus<WH3651> have they loved<WH157> to wander,<WH5128> they have not refrained<WH2820> their feet,<WH7272> therefore the LORD<WH3068> does not accept<WH7521> them; he will now<WH4994> remember<WH2142> their iniquity,<WH5771> and visit<WH6485> their sins.<WH2403>
Then said<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> to me, Pray<WH6419> not for this<WH2088> people<WH5971> for their good.<WH2896>

When<WH3588> they fast,<WH6684> I will not hear<WH8085> their cry;<WH7440> and when<WH3588> they offer<WH5927> burnt<WH5930> offering and an oblation,<WH4503> I will not accept<WH7521> them: but I will consume<WH3615> them by the sword,<WH2719> and by the famine,<WH7458> and by the pestilence.<WH1698>

Then said<WH559> I, Ah,<WH162> Lord<WH136> GOD!<WH3069> behold,<WH2009> the prophets<WH5030> say<WH559> to them, You shall not see<WH7200> the sword,<WH2719> neither<WH3808> shall you have famine;<WH7458> but I will give<WH5414> you assured<WH571> peace<WH7965> in this<WH2088> place.<WH4725>

Then the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> to me, The prophets<WH5030> prophesy<WH5012> lies<WH8267> in my name:<WH8034> I sent<WH7971> them not, neither<WH3808> have I commanded<WH6680> them, neither<WH3808> spoke<WH1696> to them: they prophesy<WH5012> to you a false<WH8267> vision<WH2377> and divination,<WH7081> and a thing of nothing,<WH434> and the deceit<WH8649> of their heart.<WH3820>

Therefore<WH3651> thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> concerning<WH5921> the prophets<WH5030> that prophesy<WH5012> in my name,<WH8034> and I sent<WH7971> them not, yet they say,<WH559> Sword<WH2719> and famine<WH7458> shall not be in this<WH2063> land;<WH776> By sword<WH2719> and famine<WH7458> shall those<WH1992> prophets<WH5030> be consumed.<WH8552>

And the people<WH5971> to whom<WH834> <WH1992> they prophesy<WH5012> shall be cast<WH7993> out in the streets<WH2351> of Jerusalem<WH3389> because<WH6440> of the famine<WH7458> and the sword;<WH2719> and they shall have none<WH369> to bury<WH6912> them, them, their wives,<WH802> nor their sons,<WH1121> nor their daughters:<WH1323> for I will pour<WH8210> their wickedness<WH7451> on them.

Therefore you shall say<WH559> this<WH2088> word<WH1697> to them; Let my eyes<WH5869> run<WH3381> down with tears<WH1832> night<WH3915> and day,<WH3119> and let them not cease:<WH1820> for the virgin<WH1330> daughter<WH1323> of my people<WH5971> is broken<WH7665> with a great<WH1419> breach,<WH7667> with a very<WH3966> grievous<WH2470> blow.<WH4347>

If<WH518> I go<WH3318> forth<WH3318> into the field,<WH7704> then behold<WH2009> the slain<WH2491> with the sword!<WH2719> and if<WH518> I enter<WH935> into the city,<WH5892> then behold<WH2009> them that are sick<WH8463> with famine!<WH7458> yes,<WH3588> <WH1571> both<WH1571> the prophet<WH5030> and the priest<WH3548> go<WH5503> about<WH5503> into<WH413> a land<WH776> that they know<WH3045> not.

Have you utterly rejected<WH3988> Judah?<WH3063> has your soul<WH5315> loathed<WH1602> Zion?<WH6726> why<WH4069> have you smitten<WH5221> us, and there is no<WH369> healing<WH4832> for us? we looked<WH6960> for peace,<WH7965> and there is no<WH369> good;<WH2896> and for the time<WH6256> of healing,<WH4832> and behold<WH2009> trouble!<WH1205>
We acknowledge,<WH3045> O LORD,<WH3068> our wickedness,<WH7562> and the iniquity<WH5771> of our fathers:<WH1> for we have sinned<WH2398> against you.
Do not abhor<WH5006> us, for your name's<WH8034> sake,<WH4616> do not disgrace<WH5034> the throne<WH3678> of your glory:<WH3519> remember,<WH2142> break<WH6565> not your covenant<WH1285> with us.

Are there any among the vanities<WH1892> of the Gentiles<WH1471> that can cause rain?<WH1653> or can the heavens<WH8064> give<WH5414> showers?<WH7241> are not you he, O LORD<WH3068> our God?<WH430> therefore we will wait<WH6960> on you: for you have made<WH6213> all<WH3605> these<WH428> things.
